channel.title: ThankYou on Jim Shingler Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ThankYou on Jim Shingler Blog

item.title: Pearl Harbor Day
item.description: December 7, 1941,78 Years ago, was a day we should never forget. Many people lost their lives that day. We should never forget the ultimate sacrific that was made by the Greatest Generation. Please Take a minute to pray for all of our veterans past, present, and future. May God watch over you. Pearl Harbor veterans' memories of the 'day of infamy' live on after 78 years
